availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Edelen (Marion County, Kentucky, merchant and druggist)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, merchant and druggist. Kentucky native. Son of Leonard Edelen and Susan Edelen. Married to Mary S. Lewis Edelen in Mercer County, Kentucky, on January 23, 1855. Father of Sallie Edelen and Thomas S. Edelen. Resident in Marion County in 1850. Merchant in Lebanon in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, p. 340A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon/District 1, p. 741.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191862.
Find A Grave, "J. H. Edelen (1833-1902)," Memorial #112259404, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/112259404 (accessed February 5, 2019).
